GeneDef.label: natural leader
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene develop a set of mental, emotional, and psychic traits that make them naturally adept at leading others.\n\nCarriers gain access to a special social interaction, which can temporarily boost the working speed of the recipient, as long as they do not also carry this gene.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Requires the carrier to have a special title or role.
Can inspire others to work faster by interacting with them.
